String.string: Sikander's slumber should not be disturbed.
Prefect Ghazi was a loyal ally of General Kanmur. Go to Dragonfall and ask Ghazi about Kanmur's confidential reports. (Press to use the teleport scroll you received.)
Find Centurion Thaqib in the Darkquaver Garrison in the Darkquaver Woods and get information left behind by Kanmur. (You can use the teleportal in the town to travel to the Darkquaver Garrison.)
Check the dead guard's body in The Skyleaves.
Bring the report you recovered at Valumnir Outpost to {@linkcreature:255#1153#Rowin}.
Bring the report you recovered at Valumnir Outpost to {@linkcreature:255#1153#Rowin}.
There are the bodies of the guards!
Search Staff of Isren for the guards who traveled with Neira.
Go to Staff of Isren and rescue Neira.
Eliminate the priests that are reinforcing the Ishlangu.
Deactivate the Ishlangu and free Isrenia.
